questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: They're waiting for their bags.
They're about to board the plane.

questions.script:

（B）They're about to board the plane.
（C）They're relaxing in a waiting area.

很多座位都有人。

·They are talking in a group.
他们正聚集在一起谈话。
·The place is bright and spacious.
这里明亮而宽敞。
·The room is brightly lit.

女士正在推独轮车。
·She is transporting some dirt.
她正在运一些土。
·The wheelbarrow is full of dirt.

The sailboat is being pushed into the water.

船在树荫下。
·A boat has been left under the trees.
一艘船被留在树下。
·The boat has been taken out of the water.

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.

The windows have been left unclosed.

所有的窗户都开着。
·Light is shining through the windows.
阳光透过窗户照进来。
·The television has been placed in the corner of the room.

questions.question: Listen to the audio and choose the best description.
options: She's preparing dinner for her family.

questions.script:

（B）She's wiping off the kitchen counter.

427

（B）她在擦洗厨房的操作台。

注：在Part 1中，每道试题都添加了3种可能的正确表达方式，考生可
以了解对于同样的照片可能出现的不同表达。

questions.question: Who was that talking to Mr. Thompson at the conference?

I'll go with you.

会上和汤普森先生说话的人是谁？
（A）一个小时之后。
（B）我会和你一起去。
（C）我们的新接待员。

conference?

你认识会上站在汤普森先生旁边的那个人吗？
—她是新来的接待员。

428

A Line up at Platform 7.
我应该在哪儿等从底特律来的公交车？
—在7号站台排队。

questions.question: What kind of car are you thinking of getting?
options: I want something with good mileage.
I didn't drive today.

A Something that's good on gas.
你想买哪种汽车？
—省油的汽车。

questions.question: Do you think I should pack my umbrella?
options: Yes, I think he will do it.
It is scheduled to stop soon.
Yes, I heard rain is in the forecast. 你认为我应该带上雨伞吗？
questions.script:

你认为我应该带上雨伞吗？
（A）是的，我认为他会这么做。
（B）按计划它就要停止了。
（C）是的，我听天气预报说有雨。
Q Do you think I need to take my umbrella with me?
A You should. It's going to pour today.
你觉得我需要带上雨伞吗？
—你应该带。今天会下大雨。

questions.question: Should we finish what we're doing or go for lunch first?
options: They're doing it now.
Let's get this over with first.
Some sandwiches and drinks.

（B）Let's get this over with first.

我们应该继续把工作做完还是先吃午饭？

得到这个职位的。我的意思是，实事求是地说，咱们办公室里没有谁能做得
了你这份工作。

Questions 35 through 37 refer to the following conversation.
M: Do you know why Ms. Sato called a meeting for 11?（36）I thought she
was leaving for Chicago this morning.

happy with the proposal we put together, and she said she couldn't possibly
present that in Chicago today.（35）So, she called a meeting this morning to talk

eleven o'clock.
M: I hope the meeting will be short. I have to meet a client at 12:00 for
lunch on the other side of town, and I have to leave the office by 11:30 at the
latest.（37）
W: Well, I am sure that Ms. Sato will let you go early if you tell her about
the situation before the meeting starts.（37）

最晚11点半就得从办公室出发。

W: Hi, my name is Sarah Ferguson, and I made a reservation for a non-

is facing the park, not the river.

room. Oh well, I guess mistakes happen. I'll just take the room facing the park then.

a free dinner coupon for two at our hotel restaurant located on the basement
floor.（40）

电脑里的信息，您的房间是朝向公园的，不是河畔。

免费双人晚餐券，餐厅在地下一层。

W: Hey, David, I just dropped off my car to get an oil change at George's

work they did to your car the last time you took it in.

downtown somewhere.（43）

M：我知道，但是我在我家附近发现一个更好更便宜的地方。另外，乔

个地方自己开店了。

Could everybody please stop working for a minute and listen carefully? As
you know, there are only four days until Christmas. Our company has been
approached by the St. Vincent de Paul Society with an urgent request. St. Vincent's
Christmas Appeal aims to provide blankets and hot meals to all of the city's
homeless on Christmas Day.（86）However, this year they have not received a
sufficient number of blankets. Could all of you please check your cupboards to
see if you have any warm blankets to spare? Please only bring clean blankets
in good condition.（87）Collectors from St. Vincent's will be calling tomorrow
and Friday,（88）so I hope you all can help out.
请大家把工作停一会儿，听仔细了。大家都知道，离圣诞节只有4天
了。圣文森特·保罗教会找到我们公司商量一个紧急请求。圣文森特的圣诞

多余的、暖和的毯子腾出来。请把干净、完好的毯子带来。圣文森特收毯子
的人会在明天和周五打电话来，所以我希望大家都能帮忙。

Now that you've checked in, I'd like to let you know about some of the
hotel's facilities.（92）First, on the second floor, there are separate
gentlemen's and ladies' saunas. These are provided free to our guests（93）
and are open from seven o'clock in the morning until ten in the evening. They are a
wonderful way of relaxing after a long day. Second, the basement sports center
offers a lap swimming pool, two squash courts, a weight room, and a relaxation
center where you can enjoy yoga, massages, and aromatherapy. You can buy daily
discount entry cards at the reception desk.（94）And finally, on behalf of the
hotel, I'd like to offer you a free drink coupon, which can be used at the hotel
restaurant. We hope you enjoy your stay!
